summary: Encapsulates the configuration and operational components of a single Annif project, handling metadata loading, initialization of analysis tools, backend services, and subject vocabularies, and providing functionality to train models, update with new data, generate subject suggestions, and manage model lifecycle.
business_intent: Offers a cohesive interface for managing a text classification or subject indexing project within Annif, enabling setup, training, incremental learning, suggestion generation, and maintenance of the project's resources.
